entries.journal_entry_description: You are to infiltrate a Rebel command base looking for information about the destruction of the Death Star.
entries.journal_entry_title: Investigating the Destruction of the Death Star
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Infiltrate a Rebel command base on Talus and look for information about the destruction of the Death Star.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: At the Rebel base, you found information naming 3 Rebel pilots who are believed to have been part of the attack at Yavin IV. Eliminate them.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Colonel Veers at the Emperor's Retreat.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Kill the third Rebel pilot, Fen Corandel. Rebel data gives his last known location as the Geonosian bunker on Yavin IV, but apparently he has not signed in for quite some time.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Destroy the second Rebel pilot, Aramis Kariya. Listed as scouting the Mist Falls on Dathomir.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Defeat the first Rebel pilot, Raphael Mar-Shayal. According to Rebel personel records you recovered, he is on Lok doing research at Mount Chaolt.
entries.task07_item_name: Download information about the Death Star
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Search for information regarding the destruction of the Death Star.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Eliminate the Rebel commander at the base, Major Dare Nekor.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Eliminate Rebel troopers at the base.
